description: T.6 Cedar - 2.5m Lateral reduction over garages & reshape into main crown.T.7 Cedar - 3m Lateral reduction over garages, 2m holistic crown reshape & deadwood.T. 9  Maple - 1.5m Lateral reduction from roadway.T.10  Elm - Fell (Open wound with decay present).T.15  Sycamore - Fell (Diseased with decay and major cavity at base).T.17 Lime - Prune to previous points. T.18  Lime - Fell (Diseased with decay and cavities).T.20  Lime - Prune to previous points.
